    Use file explorer

    use-file-explorer.Rmd
    library(servers.tools)

    File explorer

    The file explorer is a RStudio addin.

    #' \dontrun{
library(shiny)
library(shinyFiles)
library(shinyTree)
# shinyFiles::shinyFilesExample()
file_explorer()

# Use with custom path
cat("test", file = tempfile("custom", fileext = ".R"))
file_explorer(path = tempdir())
#' }
